entry.title: Windows 文件资源管理器欺骗漏洞
entry.content:
漏洞信息

漏洞名称： Windows 文件资源管理器欺骗漏洞

漏洞编号：

  • CVE： CVE-2025-24071

漏洞类型： 信息泄露

漏洞等级： 高危

漏洞描述： CVE-2025-24071 是 Windows 文件资源管理器中的一个欺骗漏洞，利用了 Windows 对 .library-ms 文件的隐式信任和自动解析特性。攻击者通过构造包含恶意 SMB 路径的 .library-ms 文件并打包为 ZIP/RAR 文件，解压时，Windows 资源管理器会自动尝试连接到指定的 SMB 服务器，从而泄露用户的 NTLM Hash。

产品厂商： Microsoft

产品名称： Windows 文件资源管理器

影响版本： Windows 10 Version 1809 for x64-based Systems, Windows 10 Version 1809 for 32-bit Systems, Windows Server 2025 (Server Core installation), Windows Server 2025, Windows Server 2012 R2 (Server Core installation), Windows Server 2012 R2, Windows Server 2016 (Server Core installation), Windows Server 2016, Windows 10 Version 1607 for x64-based Systems, Windows 10 Version 1607 for 32-bit Systems, Windows 10 for x64-based Systems, Windows 10 for 32-bit Systems, Windows 11 Version 24H2 for x64-based Systems, Windows 11 Version 24H2 for ARM64-based Systems, Windows Server 2022, 23H2 Edition (Server Core installation), Windows 11 Version 23H2 for x64-based Systems, Windows 11 Version 23H2 for ARM64-based Systems, Windows 10 Version 22H2 for 32-bit Systems, Windows 10 Version 22H2 for ARM64-based Systems, Windows 10 Version 22H2 for x64-based Systems, Windows 11 Version 22H2 for x64-based Systems, Windows 11 Version 22H2 for ARM64-based Systems, Windows 10 Version 21H2 for x64-based Systems, Windows 10 Version 21H2 for ARM64-based Systems, Windows 10 Version 21H2 for 32-bit Systems, Windows Server 2022 (Server Core installation), Windows Server 2022, Windows Server 2019 (Server Core installation), Windows Server 2019

来源： https://github.com/Threekiii/Awesome-POC/blob/6f36847b2c1ac950ae5ad80c46863d3e48881652/%E6%93%8D%E4%BD%9C%E7%B3%BB%E7%BB%9F%E6%BC%8F%E6%B4%9E%2FWindows%20%E6%96%87%E4%BB%B6%E8%B5%84%E6%BA%90%E7%AE%A1%E7%90%86%E5%99%A8%E6%AC%BA%E9%AA%97%E6%BC%8F%E6%B4%9E%20CVE-2025-24071.md

类型： Threekiii/Awesome-POC:github commit

来源概述

Windows 文件资源管理器欺骗漏洞 CVE-2025-24071

漏洞描述

CVE-2025-24071 是 Windows 文件资源管理器中的一个欺骗漏洞，利用了 Windows 对 .library-ms 文件的隐式信任和自动解析特性。攻击者通过构造包含恶意 SMB 路径的 .library-ms 文件并打包为 ZIP/RAR 文件，解压时，Windows 资源管理器会自动尝试连接到指定的 SMB 服务器，从而泄露用户的 NTLM Hash。

参考链接：

  • https://msrc.microsoft.com/update-guide/vulnerability/CVE-2025-24071
  • https://cti.monster/blog/2025/03/18/CVE-2025-24071.html
  • https://github.com/0x6rss/CVE-2025-24071_PoC
  • https://github.com/ThemeHackers/CVE-2025-24071

漏洞影响

环境搭建

搭建一个未安装补丁的 Windows 11 Version 23H2 漏洞环境：

可以按 Win+R 键，输入 winver ，然后按 Enter 键查看 Windows 操作系统的版本号。

漏洞复现

通过 该项目 构造一个恶意压缩包 exploit.zip，压缩包中包含一个名为 document.library-ms 的恶意文件：

构造的恶意文件 document.library-ms 中包含一个 <simpleLocation> 标签，标签直接指向攻击者控制的 SMB 服务器：

由于 Windows 资源管理器隐式信任 .library-ms 文件，提取后，Windows 资源管理器会尝试自动解析 SMB 路径 \\192.168.174.2\shared，以收集元数据和索引文件信息，此操作将触发从受害者系统到攻击者控制的 SMB 服务器的隐式 NTLM 身份验证握手。攻击者控制的 SMB 服务器接收到 NTLMv2 Hash：

攻击者可以使用 Hashcat 对 NTLMv2 Hash 进行破解（-m 5600）。

漏洞 POC

漏洞修复

  • 微软已发布安全补丁，链接： https://msrc.microsoft.com/update-guide/vulnerability/CVE-2025-24071
entry.summary:
漏洞信息

漏洞名称： Windows 文件资源管理器欺骗漏洞

漏洞编号

entry.title: Pterodactyl Panel 漏洞检查与利用工具
entry.content:
漏洞信息

漏洞名称： Pterodactyl Panel 漏洞检查与利用工具

漏洞编号：

  • CVE： CVE-2025-49132

漏洞类型： 信息泄露

漏洞等级： 高危

漏洞描述： 一个Python脚本，用于自动化发现和利用配置不当的Pterodactyl面板中的漏洞。包括发现敏感配置文件的暴露、提取MySQL数据库的凭证、自动创建具有完全访问权限的管理员用户以及检测并跳过受Cloudflare保护的面板。

产品厂商： Pterodactyl

产品名称： Pterodactyl Panel

来源： https://github.com/nfoltc/CVE-2025-49132

类型： CVE-2025:github search

仓库文件

  • README.md
  • cve.py

来源概述

🛡️ Pterodactyl Panel Vulnerability Checker & Exploit Tool

✨ Sobre

Um script Python que automatiza a descoberta e exploração de vulnerabilidades em painéis Pterodactyl mal configurados.

  • 🔍 Descobre exposição da configuração sensível (arquivo locale.json).
  • 🔑 Extrai credenciais do banco MySQL.
  • 👑 Cria usuário admin automaticamente com acesso total.
  • ☁️ Detecta e pula painéis protegidos por Cloudflare.

⚙️ Tecnologias e Dependências

🚀 Como usar

  1. Crie um arquivo list.txt com URLs dos painéis alvo (um por linha).

  2. Execute:

entry.title: Drag and Drop Multiple File Upload for Contact Form 7 文件上传漏洞
entry.content:
漏洞信息

漏洞名称： Drag and Drop Multiple File Upload for Contact Form 7 文件上传漏洞

漏洞编号：

  • CVE： CVE-2025-3515

漏洞类型： 文件上传

漏洞等级： 高危

漏洞描述： Drag and Drop Multiple File Upload for Contact Form 7 版本1.3.8.9及之前版本存在文件上传漏洞，允许通过上传.phar文件导致远程代码执行，特别是在Apache+mod_php环境下。该漏洞的CVSS v3.1评分为8.1（高危）。

产品名称： Drag and Drop Multiple File Upload for Contact Form 7

影响版本： ≤1.3.8.9

来源： https://github.com/Professor6T9/CVE-2025-3515

类型： CVE-2025:github search

仓库文件

  • README.md
  • checker.py
  • exploit.py

CVE-2025-3515

CVE‑2025‑3515 — Drag and Drop Multiple File Upload for Contact Form 7

  • Description: Arbitrary file uploads via drag‑and‑drop‑multiple‑file‑upload-contact‑form‑7 ≤1.3.8.9 allow upload of .phar files, leading to remote code execution in Apache+mod_php :contentReference[oaicite:29]{index=29}.
  • CVSS (v3.1): 8.1 (High) :contentReference[oaicite:30]{index=30}
  • Patch: Updated to ≥1.3.9.0 :contentReference[oaicite:31]{index=31}
  • References:
    • NVD: CVE‑2025‑3515 :contentReference[oaicite:32]{index=32}
    • Wiz, feedly, GitHub advisory, Wordfence, WordPress Trac links above

The tool coded in python version 3 use checker for detect the existing plugin then use the exploit
Telegram: https://t.me/Professor6T9
Team Telegram: https://t.me/TeamAnonForce6T9

entry.title: TP-Link TL-WR940N/TL-WR841N 命令注入漏洞
entry.content:
漏洞信息

漏洞名称： TP-Link TL-WR940N/TL-WR841N 命令注入漏洞

漏洞编号：

  • CVE： CVE-2023-33538

漏洞类型： 命令执行

漏洞等级： 高危

漏洞描述： TP-Link TL-WR940N/TL-WR841N路由器存在命令注入漏洞，由于/userRpm/WlanNetworkRpm.htm端点的ssid1参数输入净化不当，攻击者可以通过特制请求注入命令。此漏洞允许执行任意命令，可能导致设备完全被控制。

产品厂商： TP-Link

产品名称： TP-Link TL-WR940N/TL-WR841N

来源： https://github.com/explxx/CVE-2023-33538

类型： CVE-2023:github search

仓库文件

  • README.md
  • tplink.py

来源概述

Python Exploit for TP-Link TL-WR940N/TL-WR841N Command Injection Vulnerability

Usage Instructions

  1. Basic Vulnerability Check:

  2. Execute Custom Command:

  3. Reverse Shell (set up listener first with nc -lvnp 4444):

Important Notes:

  • These scripts are for educational and testing purposes only
  • Always get proper authorization before testing any system
  • The reboot command is used as default because it’s non-destructive and easily verifiable
  • The reverse shell may not work on all firmware versions as it depends on available binaries
  • Some firmware versions require a random path in the URL which the script attempts to detect automatically

The vulnerability exists due to improper input sanitization in the ssid1 parameter of the /userRpm/WlanNetworkRpm.htm endpoint, allowing command injection through specially crafted requests.
entry.summary:
漏洞信息

漏洞名称： TP-Link TL-WR940N/TL-WR841N 命令注入漏洞

entry.title: Langflow 远程代码执行漏洞
entry.content:
漏洞信息

漏洞名称： Langflow 远程代码执行漏洞

漏洞编号：

  • CVE： 2025-3248

漏洞类型： 命令执行

漏洞等级： 高危

漏洞描述： Langflow的/api/v1/validate/code端点不安全地执行用户提供的代码，使用Python的exec()函数，无需认证或沙箱保护。这使得远程攻击者能够执行任意的Python代码。

产品厂商： Langflow

产品名称： Langflow

影响版本： < 1.3.0

来源： https://github.com/issamjr/CVE-2025-3248-Scanner

类型： CVE-2025:github search

仓库文件

  • README.md
  • requirements.txt
  • scanner.py

来源概述

CVE-2025-3248 Langflow RCE Scanner

🔍 Description

A powerful, unauthenticated RCE scanner for CVE-2025-3248 in vulnerable Langflow instances.

  • CVE: 2025-3248
  • Type: Remote Code Execution (Unauthenticated)
  • Affected: Langflow < 1.3.0
  • Author: Issam Junior (@issamiso)

💥 Vulnerability Overview

Langflow’s /api/v1/validate/code endpoint insecurely executes user-supplied code using Python exec(), without authentication or sandboxing. This enables remote attackers to execute arbitrary Python code.

✅ Protection

  • Upgrade to Langflow 1.3.0 or newer
  • Block access to /api/v1/validate/code
  • Use proper code sandboxing (e.g., Pyodide, Docker, restricted ASTs)

⚙️ Usage

🔐 Disclaimer

This tool is for authorized security research only. Misuse is prohibited.

🛠️ Contact

Developer: Issam Junior
Telegram: @issamiso
GitHub: github.com/issamjr
entry.summary:
漏洞信息

漏洞名称： Langflow 远程代码执行漏洞

漏洞编号：<

entry.title: Roundcube Webmail 反序列化漏洞
entry.content:
漏洞信息

漏洞名称： Roundcube Webmail 反序列化漏洞

漏洞编号：

  • CVE： CVE-2025-49113

漏洞类型： 反序列化

漏洞等级： 严重

漏洞描述： Roundcube Webmail中的upload.php文件未验证’_from’参数，允许注入恶意的序列化PHP对象。这使得远程攻击者（具有有效会话）可以在邮件服务器上实现完整的远程代码执行（RCE）。

产品厂商： Roundcube

产品名称： Roundcube Webmail

影响版本： Roundcube < 1.5.10 and < 1.6.11

来源： https://github.com/issamjr/CVE-2025-49113-Scanner

类型： CVE-2025:github search

仓库文件

  • README.md
  • requirements.txt
  • scanner.py

来源概述

CVE-2025-49113 Scanner

🔍 Description

A powerful, multi-method Python scanner for detecting CVE-2025-49113, a critical remote code execution vulnerability in Roundcube Webmail.

  • CVE: 2025-49113
  • Type: Authenticated Remote Code Execution via unsafe PHP object deserialization
  • Affected Versions: Roundcube < 1.5.10 and < 1.6.11
  • Author: Issam Junior (@issamiso)

💥 Vulnerability Summary

upload.php in Roundcube Webmail does not validate the '_from' parameter, allowing injection of malicious serialized PHP objects. This enables a remote attacker (with valid session) to achieve full remote code execution (RCE) on the mail server.

🧪 Detection Methods

This scanner uses three different techniques to detect the vulnerability:

  1. Error-Based Analysis – Detects typical PHP fatal errors in the response.
  2. Serialization Leakage – Identifies object serialization responses.
  3. Header Anomaly Checks – Detects headers suggesting exploitable configurations (like exposed X-Powered-By: PHP).

The script also automatically detects Roundcube installations before testing.

✅ Protection & Mitigation

  • Upgrade to Roundcube 1.5.10 or 1.6.11
  • Filter and sanitize user input
  • Disable unserialize usage or apply secure serialization handlers
  • Enforce secure cookie attributes (HttpOnly, SameSite, etc.)

⚙️ Usage

Clone and install requirements:

Scan a single target:

Scan a list of targets:

Targets must be authenticated or simulate session using cookies (default uses roundcube_sessid=fake-session).

📁 Example File (targets.txt)

🔐 Disclaimer

This tool is intended only for authorized security auditing and educational purposes.
The author is not responsible for any damage caused by misuse.

🛠️ Contact

Developer: Issam Junior
Telegram: @issamiso
GitHub: github.com/issamjr
entry.summary:
漏洞信息

漏洞名称： Roundcube Webmail 反序列化漏洞

entry.title: Hide My WP Ghost 本地文件包含漏洞
entry.content:
漏洞信息

漏洞名称： Hide My WP Ghost 本地文件包含漏洞

漏洞编号：

  • CVE： CVE-2025-26909

漏洞类型： 文件包含

漏洞等级： 严重

漏洞描述： CVE-2025-26909是WordPress插件’Hide My WP Ghost’中的一个严重的本地文件包含（LFI）漏洞，影响版本<=5.4.01。此漏洞允许攻击者通过滥用未正确验证的文件路径输入来读取服务器上的任意文件，可能导致敏感信息泄露或远程代码执行。

产品厂商： Hide My WP Ghost

产品名称： Hide My WP Ghost

影响版本： <= 5.4.01

来源： https://github.com/issamjr/CVE-2025-26909-Scanner

类型： CVE-2025:github search

仓库文件

  • README.md
  • requirements.txt
  • scanner.py

来源概述

CVE-2025-26909 Vulnerability Scanner

A Python-based scanner and proof-of-concept script for detecting CVE-2025-26909 in WordPress plugin “Hide My WP Ghost” by Issam Junior.

🔍 Vulnerability Overview

CVE-2025-26909 is a critical Local File Inclusion (LFI) vulnerability found in versions <= 5.4.01 of the “Hide My WP Ghost” plugin. This flaw allows attackers to read arbitrary files on the server by abusing improperly validated file path inputs.

💥 Impact

Attackers may exploit this flaw to:

  • View sensitive files such as /etc/passwd, wp-config.php.
  • Execute remote PHP code using LFI chains if combined with other misconfigurations.

🛡️ Mitigation

  • Update the plugin to version 5.4.02 or newer.
  • Disable the “Change Paths” feature if it is not needed.
  • Apply file inclusion filtering and file access hardening (AppArmor, chroot, etc).

🚀 Usage

1. Clone the tool

2. Install dependencies

3. Run the scanner

📁 Output Format

  • [+] Vulnerable
  • [-] Not Vulnerable
  • [*] Checking
  • [!] Errors

👨‍💻 Author

  • Issam Junior
  • Telegram: @issamiso
  • GitHub: issamjr
entry.summary:
漏洞信息

漏洞名称： Hide My WP Ghost 本地文件包含漏洞

entry.title: Likes and Dislikes Wordpress Plugin Unauthenticated SQLi Vulnerability
entry.content:
漏洞信息

漏洞名称： Likes and Dislikes Wordpress Plugin Unauthenticated SQLi Vulnerability

漏洞编号：

  • CVE： CVE-2025-5287

漏洞类型： SQL注入

漏洞等级： 高危

漏洞描述： WordPress的Likes and Dislikes插件在所有版本至1.0.0中，由于对用户提供的参数’post’的转义不足以及现有SQL查询的准备不足，存在SQL注入漏洞。这使得未经认证的攻击者可以向现有查询中附加额外的SQL查询，从而用于从数据库中提取敏感信息。漏洞由Khaled Alenazi (Nxploited)披露。

产品厂商： WordPress

产品名称： Likes and Dislikes Plugin

影响版本： version <= 1.0.0

来源： https://github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei-templates/blob/02ff3ce104c9729f6772ad02d3d8c04e8a836870/http%2Fcves%2F2025%2FCVE-2025-5287.yaml

类型： projectdiscovery/nuclei-templates:github issues

POC详情

entry.title: Apache Dubbo 反序列化漏洞
entry.content:
漏洞信息

漏洞名称： Apache Dubbo 反序列化漏洞

漏洞编号：

  • CVE： CVE-2019-17564

漏洞类型： 反序列化

漏洞等级： 严重

漏洞描述： Apache Dubbo 2.7.0至2.7.4版本、2.6.0至2.6.7版本以及所有2.5.x版本中存在反序列化漏洞，由于在HTTP POST请求中接受不受信任的Java对象，攻击者可以通过发送恶意的Java对象完全控制Provider实例，前提是HTTP被启用。

产品厂商： Apache

产品名称： Dubbo

影响版本： 2.5.x, 2.6.0 <= version <= 2.6.7, 2.7.0 <= version <= 2.7.4

来源： https://github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei-templates/issues/12444

类型： projectdiscovery/nuclei-templates:github issues

来源概述

Description:

Apache Dubbo versions 2.7.0 to 2.7.4, 2.6.0 to 2.6.7, and all 2.5.x versions contain an insecure deserialization caused by accepting untrusted Java objects in HTTP POST requests, letting attackers fully compromise a Provider instance if HTTP is enabled, exploit requires attacker to send malicious Java object.

Severity: Critical
POC:
  • https://github.com/fairyming/CVE-2019-17564
  • https://github.com/Dor-Tumarkin/CVE-2019-17564-FastJson-Gadget
  • https://github.com/Exploit-3389/CVE-2019-17564
  • https://github.com/Hu3sky/CVE-2019-17564
  • https://github.com/Jaky5155/CVE-2019-17564
  • https://github.com/r00t4dm/CVE-2019-17564

KEV: True

Shodan Query: NA

Acceptance Criteria: The template must include a complete POC and should not rely solely on version-based detection. Contributors are required to provide debug data(-debug) along with the template to help the triage team with validation or can also share a vulnerable environment like docker file.

Rewards will only be given once the template is fully validated by the team. Templates that are incomplete or invalid will not be accepted. Avoid adding code templates for CVEs that can be achieved using HTTP, TCP, or JavaScript. Such templates are blocked by default and won’t produce results, so we prioritize creating templates with other protocols unless exceptions are made.

You can check the FAQ for the Nuclei Templates Community Rewards Program here.
entry.summary:
漏洞信息

漏洞名称： Apache Dubbo 反序列化漏洞

漏洞编号

Shodan Query: NA

Acceptance Criteria: The template must include a complete POC and should not rely solely on version-based detection. Contributors are required to provide debug data(-debug) along with the template to help the triage team with validation or can also share a vulnerable environment like docker file.

Rewards will only be given once the template is fully validated by the team. Templates that are incomplete or invalid will not be accepted. Avoid adding code templates for CVEs that can be achieved using HTTP, TCP, or JavaScript. Such templates are blocked by default and won’t produce results, so we prioritize creating templates with other protocols unless exceptions are made.

entry.title: Autonami App 未授权插件安装漏洞
entry.content:
漏洞信息

漏洞名称： Autonami App 未授权插件安装漏洞

漏洞编号：

  • CVE： CVE-2025-1562

漏洞类型： 未授权访问

漏洞等级： 高危

漏洞描述： Autonami App存在一个未授权插件安装漏洞，攻击者可以通过发送特制的POST请求到/index.php?rest_route=%2Fautonami-app%2Fplugin%2Finstall_and_activate端点，尝试安装并激活恶意插件。由于无法直接获取插件路径，利用此漏洞的难度较大。

产品名称： Autonami App

来源： https://github.com/maximo896/CVE-2025-1562

类型： CVE-2025:github search

仓库文件

  • README.md

来源概述

CVE-2025-1562

无权限激活插件，无法直接获取到插件路径，利用难度大
unable to activate evil plugin, unable to retrieve the plugin path, difficult to attach

entry.content:

漏洞编号：

  • CVE： 2025-30004

漏洞类型： 命令执行

漏洞等级： 高危

漏洞描述： Xorcom CompletePBX 5.2.35及更早版本中存在一个通过任务调度功能实现认证后的命令注入漏洞。该漏洞允许具有web服务器权限的用户执行任意命令。只有超级管理员用户（admin）有权限触发此漏洞。

entry.title: Apache HTTP Server Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
entry.content:
漏洞信息

漏洞名称： Apache HTTP Server Remote Code Execution Vulnerability

漏洞编号：

  • CVE： CVE-2020-11984

漏洞类型： 命令执行

漏洞等级： 严重

漏洞描述： Apache HTTP Server 2.4.32至2.4.44版本中的mod_proxy_uwsgi模块存在信息泄露和可能的远程代码执行漏洞，远程攻击者通过发送精心构造的请求可以访问敏感信息并可能执行任意代码。

产品厂商： apache

产品名称： http_server

影响版本： 2.4.32 <= version <= 2.4.44

搜索语法： server: cpe:”cpe:2.3:a:apache:http_server”

来源： https://github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei-templates/blob/e26ecd76b84e1ea8241abe91fd4e65d37908c2c3/code%2Fcves%2F2020%2FCVE-2020-11984.yaml

类型： projectdiscovery/nuclei-templates:github issues

POC详情

entry.title: Apache HTTP Server mod_proxy_uwsgi 信息泄露与远程代码执行漏洞
entry.content:
漏洞信息

漏洞名称： Apache HTTP Server mod_proxy_uwsgi 信息泄露与远程代码执行漏洞

漏洞编号：

  • CVE： CVE-2020-11984

漏洞类型： 信息泄露

漏洞等级： 严重

漏洞描述： Apache HTTP Server 2.4.32至2.4.44版本中的mod_proxy_uwsgi模块存在信息泄露及可能的远程代码执行漏洞，允许远程攻击者通过发送特制请求访问敏感信息并可能执行任意代码。

产品厂商： Apache

产品名称： HTTP Server

影响版本： 2.4.32 <= version <= 2.4.44

搜索语法： cpe:”cpe:2.3:a:apache:http_server”

来源： https://github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei-templates/issues/12266

类型： projectdiscovery/nuclei-templates:github issues

来源概述

Description:

Apache HTTP Server 2.4.32 to 2.4.44 contains an info disclosure and possible remote code execution caused by a vulnerability in mod_proxy_uwsgi, letting remote attackers access sensitive information and potentially execute arbitrary code, exploit requires sending crafted requests.

Severity: Critical
POC:
  • http://packetstormsecurity.com/files/159009/Apache2-mod_proxy_uwsgi-Incorrect-Request-Handling.html

KEV: True

Shodan Query: cpe:"cpe:2.3:a:apache:http_server"

Acceptance Criteria: The template must include a complete POC and should not rely solely on version-based detection. Contributors are required to provide debug data(-debug) along with the template to help the triage team with validation or can also share a vulnerable environment like docker file.

Rewards will only be given once the template is fully validated by the team. Templates that are incomplete or invalid will not be accepted. Avoid adding code templates for CVEs that can be achieved using HTTP, TCP, or JavaScript. Such templates are blocked by default and won’t produce results, so we prioritize creating templates with other protocols unless exceptions are made.

You can check the FAQ for the Nuclei Templates Community Rewards Program here.
entry.summary:
漏洞信息

漏洞名称： Apache HTTP Server mod_proxy_uwsgi 信息泄露
